extendedInfo.description: Have you ever noticed, all that we see is made up of shapes? We make figure study of a real-life object simple yet recognizable through shapes. Thus, from the real-life context, all that we see is a combination of shapes. This app is specially designed for your child to get hands-on with kids preschool shapes. This super coloring high resolution artwork educational game makes your pre-school kid involved and happy. This kind of fun brain activities make fun to learn with no stress and over stimulation.***Whatâs so good about this app***â Use your fancy imagination to color the kids shapesâ Select from a range of colors and brush sizes to fill in the tiny detailsâ To undo the color, use eraser toolâ The background fun music keeps you involved and happy while recognizing shapes and coloring themâ Select coloring tool and keep finger-painting while the-machine-fills it for you***How to get along with it***Very simple! Your toddler can select one of the teasers shapes, be it a circle, rectangle, triangle, square rhombus, oval, cube, star or whatever. Tap the color button, adjust brush size and there you go. Save it to the gallery/SD card when you are done and show it to your friends.This kids doodle preschool shapes coloring fun rewards with learning through audio and visual stimuli. I play this too! And I am sure your toddler will have fun coloring magical shapes with Pre School Shapes. So get it on your device now because itâs fun and useful.***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Very annoying!!!
reviews.comment: I installed for my preschooler.  Well mistake!  I wouldn\'t even give a star but i had to in order to leave feed back.  So. ..Unless you are a type of person that really enjoyes being notified every hr to upload another app of theirs... don\'t install!  Oh and if you do install the extra app why not? Right?  Well then you\'ll get a notification to upload 2 more apps of their! Freaking annoying! I deleted all their apps. Thanks app makers you just lost a parent to your harassment!
reviews.author: Tara McCabe

reviews.title: Spam!
reviews.comment: I get stuff saying I\'ve won a gift card etc from it! Not what it says it is. RUN AWAY!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Downloaded a bunch of added crap to my.phone
reviews.author: Michele Hastings
